statements: SELECT * FROM PassengerInformation;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM PassengerInformation;
SELECT name, gender, age FROM PassengerInformation;
SELECT * FROM PassengerInformation WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM PassengerInformation WHERE reservation_status = true;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM PassengerInformation WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM PassengerInformation WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM PassengerInformation ORDER BY gender
SELECT name, age, boarding_gate FROM PassengerInformation WHERE reservation_status = true
SELECT COUNT(passenger_id) AS total_passengers FROM PassengerInformation
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM passengers WHERE passenger_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(*) as ticket_count FROM tickets GROUP BY passenger_id;
SELECT MAX(seat_number) FROM tickets;
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT passenger_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM passengers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01' AND departure_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT passenger_id, first_name, last_name, ticket_type, departure_date FROM passengers JOIN tickets ON passengers.passenger_id = tickets.passenger_id;
SELECT MAX(seat_number) AS max_seat_number FROM tickets;
SELECT * FROM boarding_details;
SELECT ticket_number, ticket_date FROM ticketing;
SELECT reservation_id, passenger_id, route_id, reservation_date FROM reservations;
SELECT passenger_id, ticket_type FROM ticketing WHERE ticket_type = 'Economy';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE route_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ticketing WHERE ticket_type = 'Economy' ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_number, ticket_type, ticket_date FROM ticketing WHERE ticket_number BETWEEN 1001 AND 2000;
SELECT passenger_id, ticket_number FROM ticketing JOIN reservations ON ticketing.passenger_id = reservations.passenger_id;
SELECT * FROM ticketing WHERE ticket_date >= '2022-01-01' AND ticket_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, COUNT(ticket_number) AS ticket_count FROM ticketing GROUP BY passenger_id ORDER BY ticket_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT name, age FROM passengers WHERE gender='male';
SELECT ticket_type, fare, issue_date FROM tickets WHERE fare > 100;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE status='confirmed' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, seat_number FROM boarding_details WHERE boarding_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, name, gender FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT passenger_id, issue_date, fare FROM tickets WHERE fare > 100 ORDER BY issue_date;
SELECT reservations.reservation_id, passengers.name, reservations.reservation_date, reservations.status FROM reservations JOIN passengers ON reservations.passenger_id = passengers.passenger_id;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT passenger_id, name, age FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, seat_number, route_id FROM reservations WHERE passenger_id = 101 ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_type, price FROM tickets WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM passengers WHERE age >= 30
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 1000
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, seat_number, route_id FROM reservations WHERE seat_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT passenger_id, name, contact_number FROM passengers WHERE gender = 'Female'
